short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a personalized version of the Hacker News homepage and find similar stories for any story.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Hacker News experience with personalized story recommendations based on your interests. This extension adds:

• Recommendations page: Adds a "Recommended" button in the top menu that shows a personalized version of the homepage, based on your liked posts.
• Like Stories button: Save interesting stories by clicking the "like" button next to any post.
• Similar button: View similar stories from all historical HN posts by clicking the "similar" button next to any post.

Features:
• Seamlessly integrates with the native Hacker News interface
• No account required - likes are stored locally in your browser
• Works on all HN pages

Privacy Note: All liked stories are stored locally on your device. No personal data is collected or shared.
